hotel_name_: Midas Hotel and Casino - Multiple Use Hotel
location: 2702 Roxas Boulevard, Pasay, 1300 Manila, Philippines
description: Along Roxas Boulevard providing views of the famous Manila Bay, Midas Hotel features 2 dining options, a casino and contemporary rooms with a private balcony. It has a business center and offers free Wi-Fi access in the entire property. The hotel provides free scheduled shuttle service to the famous SM Mall of Asia, which is just over 1.6 km away. The World Trade Center and Cultural Center of the Philippines are 4 km away, and Ninoy Aquino International Airport is accessible with a 4.8 km drive. Elegantly furnished, rooms are well-equipped with an in-room safe, a flat-screen cable TV, fridge and comfortable sitting area. Tea/coffee making facilities and minibar are also included. The private bathroom features a bathtub, bathrobes and a 3-way combination shower. Available 24/7, the front desk staff at Midas Hotel and Casino can assist guests with luggage storage and concierge services. Guests can use the fitness center, or enjoy a pampering massage at the spa. Free parking is also provided for guests who drive. The in-house Midas Café serves local buffet dining throughout the day. Authentic Japanese cuisine is also available at Yanagi Restaurant.

location: CCP Complex, Roxas Boulevard, Pasay, 1300 Manila, Philippines
description: Located in Pasay City, Sofitel Philippine Plaza Manila offers rooms with private balconies and views of Manila Bay. It features an outdoor pool, a spa, various restaurants and bars. Air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a cable TV, a personal safe and ironing facilities. Private bathrooms come with a hairdryer, bathtub and free toiletries. Exercise options include a jogging trail, tennis courts and a fitness center. Guests can enjoy a pampering massage at Le SPA or relax at the spa pool and sauna. Other facilities include a grand ballroom and 14 meeting rooms. The hotel’s flagship restaurant, Spiral, features 21 dining ateliers that serve exquisite dishes prepared masterfully in the presence of guests. Drinks can be enjoyed at Le Veranda  and Sunset Bar. Sports fan can catch up on the latest matches at Snaps Sports Bar. Sofitel Philippine Plaza Manila is located beside the Cultural Center of the Philippines Complex. It is less than 1.2 mi away from the Mall of Asia. It is located about 4.3 mi away from Manila International Airport and a 30-minute drive from Makati City.

location: Meralco Avenue & Sapphire Street, Ortigas Center, Pasig, 1600 Manila, Philippines
description: Located in the heart of Manila’s city center, Marco Polo Ortigas Manila features luxurious rooms with spectacular views. Featuring 3 dining options, this 5-star hotel also has an indoor pool and free Wi-Fi access. Marco Polo Ortigas Manila is less than 0.6 mi from popular attractions including The Podium and Metrowalk. SM Megamall is 0.6 mi away while Ninoy Aquino International Airport is 30 minutes away by car. Each elegant air-conditioned room features a flat-screen TV. An iPod dock and carpeted floors are included in all rooms. A spacious bathtub and premium toiletries are provided in the bathrooms. Guests enjoy free access to fitness center while relaxing spa treatments and soothing massages can be enjoyed at the health club. The property also offers a 24-hour reception and airport shuttle services. The hotel’s signature Continental Club offers exclusive privileges. A variety of dining options, including a Chinese restaurant and a lobby lounge will serve fresh meals daily. Guests can also enjoy a cocktail at the stylish Sky Bar.

location: 1 Raffles Drive, Makati Avenue, Makati, 1224 Manila, Philippines
description: Located in the heart of Makati Central Business District, Fairmont Makati features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym and business center. It offers contemporary rooms and features an exclusive Pillow Menu to suit guests’ preferences. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the entire hotel. Fairmont Makati is conveniently located within a 3-minute walk to the Greenbelt Malls and Glorietta Malls. The Ayala Museum and SM Makati is just a 5-minute walk away. Ninoy Aquino International Airport can be reached with a 30-minute drive. Offering views of the city, air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a personal safe, a flat-screen cable TV, a mini-bar and ironing facilities. En suite marble bathrooms include a hairdryer, bathrobes, bathtub or shower facility and free bath amenities. At Fairmont Makati, the 24-hour front desk can assist with luggage storage, currency exchange and laundry services. Guests can also approach the tour desk for sightseeing and travel arrangements. Massage packages are provided at the spa. The in-house restaurant, Spectrum, serves a wide selection of international cuisines, while Café Macaron offers tasty pastries. Guests may also enjoy meals at the comfort of their beds.

hotel_name_: Hop Inn Hotel Aseana City Manila
location: Lot 9 Block 5, near corner of Bradco Avenue and Macapagal Boulevard, Aseana City,, Paranaque, 1702 Manila, Philippines
description: Located in Manila, 901 m from Mall of Asia Arena and 0.9 mi from SMX Convention Center, Hop Inn Hotel Aseana City Manila is 3-star hotel that features rooms with free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk. All units in the hotel are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV, and a working desk. The rooms at Hop Inn Hotel Aseana City Manila are also fitted with a private bathroom that has a bidet, a shower facility, and a hairdryer. A safety deposit box is also included in the room while certain rooms have views of the city. SM Mall of Asia is 0.7 mi from the accommodations, while World Trade Center Metro Manila is a 10-minute drive. Manila Ninoy Aquino International Airport is within 15-minute drive from Hop Inn Hotel Aseana City Manila.

location: 1 Aseana Avenue, Entertainment City, Paranaque, 1300 Manila, Philippines
description: Set against the scenic backdrop of Manila Bay and a 5-minute drive from SM Mall of Asia, Solaire Resort & Casino features an outdoor pool, a spa, and 17 dining options giving guests the benefit of satisfying their palete's cravings. The property also features of the state-of-the-art lyric theater that showcase world-class entertainment. The elegant rooms feature floor to ceiling windows that afford guests exquisite sunset views. Highlighting a 350 thread count bed linen, a flat-screen TV and an private bathroom that has a bathtub and a separate walk-in shower, the rooms at Solaire Resort & Casino offer guests the comforts of an urban escape. Among the several dining options, Red Lantern serves traditional Cantonese cuisine while Japanese delicacies can be enjoyed at Yakumi. At Finestra, guests may savor on their favorite Italian dishes that is paired with their choice of wine. For guests opting for casual dining, Oasis and Waterside Restobar offer International dishes and are headed by world-renowned chefs. This integrated resort offers 18,500 sqm casino with over 1200 slot machines and 300 table games. Guests can take pleasure lounging in an outdoor themed casino, an entertainment bar, and VIP salons. Concierge service is also available. Solaire Resort & Casino is a 5-minute drive from Mall of Asia Arena and 1 mi from SMX Convention Center. description: Set in Manila, 500 m from Resorts World Manila, Sheraton Manila Hotel offers accommodations with a restaurant, free private parking, a fitness center and a bar. The nearest airport is Manila Ninoy Aquino International, 0.8 km from Sheraton Manila Hotel, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service.

hotel_name_: Diamond Hotel Philippines - Multiple Use Hotel
location: Dr. J. Quintos cor. Roxas Blvd Malate, 1000 Manila, Philippines
description: Right on Manila Bay, a 30 minute drive from Ninoy Aquino International Airport, the 5-star Diamond Hotel Philippines features a spectacular free-form pool, tennis courts and a spa with reflexology treatments. The air-conditioned rooms are bright with large windows and spacious interiors. They have cable TV, a minibar and a sitting area with sofa set. Selected rooms offer great views of the bay. Luxurious massages and body treatments await guests at the spa. They can also work out at Diamond Hotel’s well-equipped fitness center or relax at the outdoor hot tub. Enjoy views of a tropical grounds with delicate Japanese dishes at the award-winning Yurakuen Japanese Restaurant. Corniche Restaurant provides an international menu, while the Sky Lounge Music Bar offers a variety of beverages. Room service is available. The Diamond Philippines is a 10 minute drive from Luneta Park and a 20 minute drive from the Mall of Asia. Car rental facilities are available at the hotel.

location: One Rizal Park, 0913 Manila, Philippines
description: Manila Hotel is a beautiful 5-star hotel located in Manila just 701 m from iconic Intramuros and 901 m from Manila Cathedral. The hotel provides free Wi-Fi access and facilities like in-house dining options, a business center and an outdoor swimming pool. Rooms are elegantly decorated and provide guests with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a seating area. Featuring a shower, the private bathrooms also come with a bath and a hairdryer. The suites have an ipod docking station, bathrooms fitted with Italian marble and a senso memory foam mattress. Some rooms offer views of Manila Bay, while other offer views of the city. The Red Jade Restaurant serves authentic Cantonese dishes, while The Champagne Room provides French delicacies. There is also Cafe Ilang-Ilang which serves Halal and international cuisines. Guests can also relax in The Tap Room Bar or in the lobby lounge. Alternatively, enjoy a refreshing drink by the Pool Bar. The hotel's deli services desserts and drinks throughout the day. Other facilities at the hotel include a fitness center and a spa. The spa offers a variety of massages. The hotel is located 901 m from Palacio del Gobernador, while Ninoy Aquino Airport is 6.5 mi away. The property offers free parking for guests' convenience.

location: 30th Street corner 5th Avenue, Bonifacio Global City, Taguig, 1634 Manila, Philippines
description: Right at the heart of Manila's lifestyle city in Taguig, Shangri-La The Fort, Manila -- Staycation Approved towers over Bonifacio Global City boasting of two outdoor swimming pool, several dining options, and free WiFi throughout the property. This 5-star hotel is within 260 m from the Mind Museum and 851 m from Bonifacio High Street. Features with luxuriously furnishing, all rooms at the hotel offer views of the city and are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, air conditioning, and a safety deposit box. Every room is equipped with a private bathroom with shower or bath facilities, slippers and free toiletries. At the hotel, guests can indulge on the daily buffet breakfast and different culinary experiences. The High Street Cafe and High Street Lounge features international selection and freshly baked pastries. The Canton Road serves authentic Chinese Cuisine and the Raging Bull Chophouse & Bar is a steakhouse that serves a la carte options while the Raging Bull Burgers offers American specialties. Samba delights guests with Peruvian cuisine. In-room dining may be arranged for guests. The outdoor swimming pool provides a relaxing urban setting for guests who simply wish to lounge and marvel on city views. The pool bar is open to serve drinks. Guests can workout at the on-site fitness center or make use of the sauna. Spa at Kerry Sports Manila can help guests relax and melt their stress away with Spa at Kerry Sports' signature massage. The Kid's Club is also available with extra cost. The 24-hour front desk can assist guests with services such as laundry, dry cleaning and luggage storage. Airport shuttle and car rental may be arranged for guests at an additional cost. The hotel's meeting/banquet facility may also be used at an extra charge. Glorietta Mall is 2.5 mi away while Greenbelt Mall is 2.5 mi from the hotel. The nearest airport is Manila International Airport, 4.5 mi from Shangri-La The Fort, Manila -- Staycation Approved.

hotel_name_: Holiday Inn & Suites Makati, an IHG Hotel
location: Glorietta Mall, Palm Drive, Ayala Center, Makati, 1224 Manila, Philippines
description: Directly connected to Glorietta Mall, Holiday Inn & Suites Makati offers a gym and a rooftop bar. This contemporary property is centrally located in Makati City, a 732 m walk to Greenbelt Mall and Ayala Museum. Offering free Wi-Fi, rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a personal refrigerator with mini-bar and a desk. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and shower. A hairdryer, slippers and bathrobes are also provided. Guests can enjoy a swim at the outdoor swimming pool located at the rooftop. All-day dining options are available at Flavors Restaurant. Citron Bar serves Asian and Western dishes, while the rooftop bar and restaurant, Oz, serves a delicious Asian menu. The Holiday Inn & Suites Makati is within 3.1 mi from the Philippine International Convention Center and World Trade Center Manila. Ninoy Aquino Airport is 5 mi away. Free on-site parking is available.

description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at The Picasso Boutique Serviced Residences Managed by HII! description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Luxent Hotel! To save at this property, all you have to do is  Placed in the heart of the city, Luxent Hotel features an outdoor swimming pool overlooking splendid views of Quezon City. The property is a 1-minute walk to Scout Monument Circle, while luxuriously furnished rooms offer free WiFi. Luxent Hotel offers 2 dining options - Garden Café, which serves buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner, while Lush Bar & Lounge offers á la carte dishes with alcoholic and nonalcoholic beverages. Both restaurants serve local and international cuisines. Bread Indulgence Corner serves Illy-brand coffee, freshly-baked breads and hand-crafted cakes. In-room dining is also available for guests' comfort. Guests can relax at the spa or enjoy a traditional massage. The hotel also houses a fitness center and meeting/banquet facilities. A 24-hour front desk can assist guests with laundry/ironing services and room service. Air-conditioned rooms offer a city view and are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a sofa and a mini-bar. Private glass-wall bathrooms include hot/cold shower facilities and free toiletries. The property is located a 10-minute walk to Robinsons Mall and a 5-minute walk to the historical St Paul Church.

hotel_name_: Diamond Hotel Philippines - Multiple Use Hotel
location: Dr. J. Quintos cor. Roxas Blvd Malate, 1000 Manila, Philippines
description: Right on Manila Bay, a 30 minute drive from Ninoy Aquino International Airport, the 5-star Diamond Hotel Philippines features a spectacular free-form pool, tennis courts and a spa with reflexology treatments. The air-conditioned rooms are bright with large windows and spacious interiors. They have cable TV, a minibar and a sitting area with sofa set. Selected rooms offer great views of the bay. Luxurious massages and body treatments await guests at the spa. They can also work out at Diamond Hotel’s well-equipped fitness center or relax at the outdoor hot tub. Enjoy views of a tropical grounds with delicate Japanese dishes at the award-winning Yurakuen Japanese Restaurant. Corniche Restaurant provides an international menu, while the Sky Lounge Music Bar offers a variety of beverages. Room service is available. The Diamond Philippines is a 10 minute drive from Luneta Park and a 20 minute drive from the Mall of Asia. Car rental facilities are available at the hotel.

location: 1118 Roxas Boulevard Cor., United Nations Avenue, 1000 Manila, Philippines
description: Bayview Park Hotel is in Manila, a 5 minute drive from the Intramuros. It features an outdoor swimming pool, a coffee shop and cozy rooms with air conditioning. Free parking is available. Bayview Park Hotel Manila is a 10 minute drive from the Mall of Asia and Robinsons Place. Ninoy Aquino International Airport is a 20 minute drive away. Modern rooms come with earth color tones and are bathed in warm light. Each unit comes with a cable TV, personal safe, and an attached bathroom with shower facilities and toiletries. Guests can exercise at the gym or enjoy a relaxing body massage. The hotel has a business center that provides computers and fax/photocopying services. The staff at the 24-hour front desk can attend to guests’ requests. The coffee shop offers a spread of local and international dishes. In-room dining options are also possible with room service.

location: 8008 Makati Avenue, Corner Kalayaan, Makati, 1200 Manila, Philippines
description: Boasting an outdoor rooftop pool, and restaurant with complimentary WiFi access, City Garden Grand Hotel offers luxurious accommodations with sweeping views of the Makati landscape. Offering city views, all rooms at City Garden Grand Hotel are air-conditioned, and feature a cable LED TV and coffee/tea making facilities. Complete with a bath or shower, the private private bathrooms also offer a hairdryer and bathrobes. Guests will find a gym, an outdoor pool and several meeting and event spaces located on-site. The 24-hour front desk readily assists guests with services such as complimentary valet parking, luggage storage and tour information. City Garden Grand Hotel is located adjacent to several convenience stores, restaurants and nightlife spots. Century City Mall is located 100 m away from the hotel, while Rockwell Center and Makati Stock Exchange are within 0.7 mi away. The nearest airport is Ninoy Aquino International Airport, located 4.3 mi away.

hotel_name_: Holiday Inn Manila Galleria, an IHG Hotel - Multiple Use and Staycation Approved
location: One Asian Development Bank Avenue, Quezon City, 1655 Manila, Philippines
description: Centrally located in Ortigas Commerical District, 1.1 mi from Shangri-La Plaza and 0.8 mi from SM Megamall, Holiday Inn Manila Galleria features direct access to Robinsons Galleria Mall. The hotel also features of an outdoor swimming pool, free parking, and a 24-hour front desk. The rooms and suites at Holiday Inn Manila Galleria are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a mini-bar. The units are also equipped with an in-room safe and a desk. The private bathroom comes with a bath or shower, a hairdryer, and free toiletries. Daily buffet breakfast is served at the property while Fab Restaurant offers all-day international and local favorites. Drinks and live entertainment can be enjoyed at Bar One while room service is also available 24 hours. Guests can exercise and workout at the fully-equipped fitness center, or relax with a pampering massage at the spa. A business center is also available. Tiendesitas is 2.1 mi from the hotel and Greenhills Shopping Center is 2.4 mi. Th nearest airport is Manila International Airport, 10 mi away from Holiday Inn Manila Galleria.

location: Asean Avenue corner Roxas Boulevard Entertainment City, Paranaque, 1701 Manila, Philippines
description: City of Dreams Manila - Nüwa is a luxurious, 5-star hotel featuring an outdoor pool, restaurant and bar. Offering air-conditioned rooms, studios and suites with free WiFi and city views, the property also has an in-house casino. City of Dreams Manila - Nüwa is 1.9 mi from SM City Mall of Asia and 2.6 mi from Ninoy Aquino International Airport. Makati City is 4.3 mi away while Manila Ocean Park is 4.7 mi from the hotel. Every room, studio and suite is equipped with a flat-screen cable TV, safe, mini-bar and an electric kettle. A seating area and private bathroom with shower, hairdryer and free toiletries is included. Recreation facilities include a fitness center and spa. A 24-hour concierge and front desk service is available. Multilingual staff is on hand to serve guests, who have access to on-site shops A 24-hour room service is available. Drinks can be enjoyed from the pool side at Breezes, an elegant al fresco and inside seating restaurant.Serving a curated menu of classic Filipino dishes, Haliya features a full course of flavors including appetizers, main courses, and desserts, as well as specialty beverages inspired by local flavors. Highlighting authentic regional Chinese dishes and premium Cantonese fare, Crystal Dragon serves lunch and dinner a la carte, dim sum, fine Chinese teas and Chef’s recommendation menus. The hotel offers “complimentary mini-bar” for all room types.

location: Esperanza Street corner Makati Avenue, Ayala Center, Makati, 1228 Manila, Philippines
description: The deluxe New World Makati Hotel is in the Makati Business District. It features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness center and rooms with city/pool views. Free parking is available. The hotel is just across the street from Greenbelt Malls and a 10-minute walk from the Glorietta shopping complex. Ninoy Aquino International Airport is a 30-minute drive from the hotel. The elegant rooms include modern décor and large windows that provide plenty of natural light. Each room is fitted with a minibar and TV with cable channels. Guest can enjoy a massage at Marahai Spa or relax in the sauna. New World Makati provides car rental and currency exchange services. Dry cleaning services are available upon request. Jasmine Restaurant serves Cantonese dishes and international food is available at Café 1228. Light snacks afternoon tea and nightly musical entertainment are provided at The Lounge. location: Esperanza Street corner Makati Avenue, Ayala Center, Makati, 1228 Manila, Philippines
description: The deluxe New World Makati Hotel is in the Makati Business District. It features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness center and rooms with city/pool views. Free parking is available. The hotel is just across the street from Greenbelt Malls and a 10-minute walk from the Glorietta shopping complex. Ninoy Aquino International Airport is a 30-minute drive from the hotel. The elegant rooms include modern décor and large windows that provide plenty of natural light. Each room is fitted with a minibar and TV with cable channels. Guest can enjoy a massage at Marahai Spa or relax in the sauna. New World Makati provides car rental and currency exchange services. Dry cleaning services are available upon request. Jasmine Restaurant serves Cantonese dishes and international food is available at Café 1228. Light snacks afternoon tea and nightly musical entertainment are provided at The Lounge. location: One Asian Development Bank Avenue, Quezon City, 1655 Manila, Philippines
description: Centrally located in Ortigas Commerical District, 1.1 mi from Shangri-La Plaza and 0.8 mi from SM Megamall, Holiday Inn Manila Galleria features direct access to Robinsons Galleria Mall. The hotel also features of an outdoor swimming pool, free parking, and a 24-hour front desk. The rooms and suites at Holiday Inn Manila Galleria are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a mini-bar. The units are also equipped with an in-room safe and a desk. The private bathroom comes with a bath or shower, a hairdryer, and free toiletries. Daily buffet breakfast is served at the property while Fab Restaurant offers all-day international and local favorites. Drinks and live entertainment can be enjoyed at Bar One while room service is also available 24 hours. Guests can exercise and workout at the fully-equipped fitness center, or relax with a pampering massage at the spa. A business center is also available. Tiendesitas is 2.1 mi from the hotel and Greenhills Shopping Center is 2.4 mi. Th nearest airport is Manila International Airport, 10 mi away from Holiday Inn Manila Galleria.

location: Corner of Ayala and Makati Avenues, 1226 , Makati, 1226 Manila, Philippines
description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at The Peninsula Manila! To save at this property, all you have to do is  Set in Manila within the central business district of Makati, 0.6 mi from Glorietta and 0.8 mi from Greenbelt Mall, The Peninsula Manila features of an outdoor swimming pool, 8 dining options, and a spa at the property. Free WiFi is also available throughout the hotel. Featuring views of the city, the rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV, and a safety deposit box. Other in-room amenities include a tea/coffee maker, a mini-bar, and an electric kettle. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer, a bath or a shower, and free toiletries while some rooms are fitted with a living and dining area. Escolta serves an international buffet, while Spices offers Asian cuisine with garden views. For afternoon tea and pastries, The Lobby is available. Enjoy fine dining at Old Manila, the hotel's signature restaurant wile elegant cocktails are served at Salon de Ning or The Bar. Deli sandwiches and chocolates are available at The Peninsula Boutique. The Pool Bar offers a refreshing outdoor dining experience while room service is also available. Guests can exercise in the gym, relax in the sauna, or make an appointment at the hair salon. Inspired by Oriental, Ayurvedic, and European practices, The Peninsula Spa features a serene setting for a much deserved urban relaxation. The hotel offers other facilities such as a gift shop and a kid's club. Airport shuttle services may be arranged for guests at an additional cost while the staff at the 24-hour front desk and concierge is willing to assist guests with any queries at any time of the day. There is an ATM and currency exchange at the property, as well as free parking. The Peninsula Manila is within 10-minute drive from Century City Mall while Power Plant Mall is 15-minute drive from the hotel. The nearest airport is Manila International Airport, 30-minute drive away from the hotel.

location: Asean Avenue corner Roxas Boulevard, Entertainment City, Paranaque, 1701 Manila, Philippines
description: Enjoy 5-star luxury at Hyatt Regency Manila City of Dreams, which features spacious, chic and modern rooms with free WiFi. The hotel features an outdoor lap pool, 2 restaurants and is part of an integrated resort complex, City of Dreams. Hyatt Regency Manila City of Dreams is a 5-minute drive to SM Mall of Asia and the SMX Convention Center. Manila International Airport, the World Trade Center and Philippine International Convention Center are approximately a 10-minute drive away. Each air-conditioned room has a flat-screen cable TV, safe, electric kettle and a complimentary mini-bar. A seating area and private bathroom with shower, hairdryer and free toiletries are included. Guests can work out at the hotel’s fitness center during their stay. Families will enjoy DreamPlay, the world's first family ‘edutainment center’ from Hollywood studio Dreamworks Animation.

location: M. Adriatico Corner Gen. Malvar Streets, Malate, 1004 Manila, Philippines
description: Centrally located in Malate, Sheraton Manila Bay showcases modern interiors with Filipino cultural and art displays. This 5-star hotel provides an outdoor pool, spa services and a 4-story shopping arcade. Rooms are fitted with free Wi-Fi and floor-to-ceiling windows with views of Manila Bay and City. All rooms come with a flat-screen TV, DVD player and over-sized work desk. The spacious bathroom has a small TV, a bathtub and a separate walk-in shower. Located in the Spanish Quarter of Manila Bay, Sheraton Manila Bay is a 5-minute walk from The Robinson's Place Mall and a 15-minute drive from The Mall of Asia. It is 5 mi from Ninoy Aquino International Airport. Free parking is available. Available 24 hours, personal butlers can help guests to arrange city tours, prepare a relaxing bubble bath or even confirm flights. Guests can also exercise at the gym or visit the on-site Adriatico Square shopping arcade. The top-floor Pacific Lounge serves international dishes and a daily buffet breakfast. Other dining options include the Lobby Lounge and Poolside Bar.

location: 7870 Makati Ave Corner Durban Street, Poblacion, Makati, 1210 Manila, Philippines
description: Enjoy leisurely stays at City Garden Makati with spacious rooms and free access to first-rate facilities, including an outdoor pool  fitness center and WiFi. Featuring city views from oversize windows, air-conditioned rooms are decorated in pleasant shades of beige and pale golds. They have cable TV and a kitchenette with free tea/coffee making amenities and a fridge. Local calls can be made for free. Relaxing spa treatments and sauna facilities await after a day’s of activity. Alternatively, take a dip in the outdoor pool located on the roofdeck. A business center and 24-hour reception are available for guests’ convenience. A variety of Asian and international dishes can be sampled at City Garden's Encima and Bistro. Located just steps away from shopping, dining and nightlife options, City Garden Hotel Makati is a 5-minute drive from major shopping malls like Glorietta and Landmark in Makati's business district. It is a 30-minute drive from Ninoy Aquino International Airport.
